Articles.Content:
i still new I just have lot for suggestion

1.Create & Developing Spacesuit and Spacecraft complex

it start weaker suit that can't walk on moon and very heavy

another during developing you have made that you can walk and light

but can't protect Radiation {if you planning that] or walk on Atmosphere planet or moon than more developing you have better suit you have

for spacecraft do almost the same thing like protection for outside for space and better engine and more like wing that go 300km also like solar panels can reach light from korbol to kerbin than to more better that go kerbol to jool and for manned ship you can build by part like the real space program for stack limit like to build you capsule you to have get window cost 300, crew hatch 500, other 900 and it said you ship is done +1 from 4 to 5 stock and do same with unmanned with their own

2.Propulsion Complex

also we know the fuel is very free and never ran out in KSP and my ldea is have more than fuel is added oxygen fuel tank

in began it start with Oxygen and fuel only than improving to from oxygen and fuel to special fuel than change to nuclear fuel for long time trip

3.Recovery and Repair Complex

when the spacecraft return from flight can be Recover to Complex to Repair and can be reuseable or take away also recover any you need like science ,Tools and even food and Drink ,like your capsule can reused and repair for the cost 300 and use for 10 time than no longer reuseable

Edited July 11, 2014 by PortalLand
more idea I come up and more hint

For example, in real life on the planet Mars has dust that falls anywhere, can get into the small gap.

In KSP can do that will still suit is very tight, so that dust does not penetrate. True for this on some planets you need to add a fine dust)
